alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:59AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 945 AM MST... At 859 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florence, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Florence Junction, Magma, Queen Valley and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 208 and 219. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 129 and 150. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 159 and 165. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
